sql_list.sql_query:
CREATE TABLE test.string_sales1 (
  `name` text,
  `country` text,
  `code` text,
  `date` text,
  `CRTD_BY` text,
  `CRTD_DTTM` text,
  `UPDT_BY` text,
  `UPDT_DTTM` text
);

INSERT INTO test.string_sales1
SELECT * FROM test.string_sales;

UPDATE test.string_sales
SET code=1000 where country = 'USA';
